TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Hupu, title = Hupu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hupu} }

S.FORM: Hupu Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Hupu a niyaro', 56 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 167 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 66% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 34% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 56 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 16%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bunun 3%, Tayal 1%, Truku 6%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.

Hopo Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Hopo a niyaro', 56 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 167 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 66% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 34% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 56 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 16%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bonon 3%, Tayal 1%, Troko 6%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.
